00001 #ifndef CPLANE_H_
00002 #define CPLANE_H_
00003 
00004 #include "math/vector3d.hpp"
00005 #include "math/quaternion.hpp"
00006 
00007 namespace math
00008 {
00009 class plane : public MathSubsystem
00010 {
00011 public:
00012         enum
00013         {
00014                 IN_FRONT =  1,
00015                 IN_BACK =  2,
00016                 IN_PLANE = 0
00017         };
00018         plane()
00019         {
00020 
00021         }
00022         plane(const vector3d& normal,float dist)
00023         {
00024                 m_Normal = normal;
00025                 m_Normal.normalize();
00026                 m_Distance = dist;
00027         }
00028         plane(const vector3d& normal,const vector3d& p)
00029         {
00030                 m_Normal = normal;
00031                 m_Normal.normalize();
00032                 m_Distance =  (p , m_Normal);
00033         }
00034         plane(float nx,float ny,float nz,float dist)
00035         {
00036                 m_Normal = vector3d(nx,ny,nz);
00037                 m_Normal.normalize();
00038                 m_Distance = dist;
00039         }
00040         plane(const vector3d& p1,const vector3d& p2, const vector3d& p3)
00041         {
00042                 m_Normal = (p2-p1)*(p3-p1);
00043                 m_Normal.normalize();
00044                 m_Distance = - (p1 , m_Normal);
00045         }
00046 
00047         plane(const plane& p)
00048         {
00049                 m_Normal        = p.m_Normal;
00050                 m_Distance      = p.m_Distance;
00051         }
00052 
00053         plane& operator= (const plane& p)
00054         {
00055                 m_Normal        = p.m_Normal;
00056                 m_Distance      = p.m_Distance;
00057                 return *this;
00058         }
00059         ~plane(){}
00060 
00061         int   classify(const vector3d& point)
00062         {
00063                 float   v = signedDistance (point);
00064                 if (v > math::eps)
00065                         return IN_FRONT;
00066                 else
00067                         if (v < -math::eps)
00068                                 return IN_BACK;
00069                 return IN_PLANE;
00070         }
00071 
00072         float signedDistance(const vector3d& point)
00073         {
00074                 return (m_Normal , point) + m_Distance;
00075         }
00076         float distance(vector3d& point)
00077         {
00078                 return (float)((fabs((m_Normal, point) + m_Distance)));
00079         }
00080 
00081         void rotate(const vector3d & Dir, float angle)
00082         {
00083                 vector3d p(-m_Distance * m_Normal);
00084                 quaternion quat(Dir, angle);
00085                 m_Normal = quat.rotate(m_Normal);
00086                 m_Distance = -(p, m_Normal);
00087         }
00088 
00089         void rotate(quaternion & q)
00090         {
00091                 vector3d p(-m_Distance * m_Normal);
00092                 m_Normal = (vector3d)((q.rotate(m_Normal)));
00093                 m_Distance = -(p, m_Normal);
00094         }
00095 
00096         void move(const vector3d & mv)
00097         {
00098                 m_Normal += mv;
00099         }
00100 
00101         void flip()
00102         {
00103                 m_Normal = -m_Normal;
00104                 m_Distance = -m_Distance;
00105         }
00106 
00107         math::vector3d getNormal() const
00108         {
00109                 return m_Normal;
00110         }
00111 
00112         void setNormal(math::vector3d& Normal)
00113         {
00114                 this->m_Normal = Normal;
00115         }
00116 
00117         float getDistance() const
00118         {
00119                 return m_Distance;
00120         }
00121 
00122         void setDistance(float Distance)
00123         {
00124                 this->m_Distance = Distance;
00125         }
00126 private:
00127         math::vector3d m_Normal;
00128         float m_Distance;
00129 
00130 };
00131 }
